title: Arcades in Ibn Tulun's mosque
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosquée Touloun. (Les arcads.) No.299. Translation of photographer's description: Tulun Mosque (The arcades) No.299. Collector's note:  S.W. end of sanctuary and S.W. riwāq.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
